snippet: The Web site is trying for pollination: providing the kind of content that will have visitors passing along links from one person to the next, that will in turn bring them around to BuzzFeed.
abstract: David Carr The Media Equation column discusses social media news site BuzzFeed, a mix of oddities, 'listicles' and Web memos; points out it provides the kind of comical and consequential content that will have visitors passing along links from one person to the next; notes site had 10.8 million unique visitors in December, more than double that of December 2010.
lead_paragraph: The Web site is trying for pollination: providing the kind of content that will have visitors passing along links from one person to the next, that will in turn bring them around to BuzzFeed.

headline.seo: At BuzzFeed, the Significant and the Silly
